self.title: CDISC Questionnaire PHQ-2 Test Code Terminology

name: Patient Health Questionnaire - 2 Item Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire PHQ-2 Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Patient Health Questionnaire - 2 Item Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: The Patient Health Questionnaire-2 - Over the past 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? Little interest or pleasure in doing things.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-2 - Little Interest or Pleasure in Doing Things

terms.definition: The Patient Health Questionnaire-2 - Over the past 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? Feeling down, depressed or hopeless.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-2 - Feeling Down, Depressed or Hopeless
